amendatorysection.catchline: Briefs; payment for printing by county.
amendatorysection.para: The cost of printing briefs on behalf of any person convicted of an offense for which the punishment adjudged is capital shall be paid by the county.

source.note: The repeal of section 29-2527 by Laws 2015, LB 268, section 35, is not effective because of the vote on the referendum at the November 2016 general election. This version of section 29-2527 is found in the 2008 Reissue of Volume 2A of the Revised Statutes of Nebraska.
